title: bersekerbarragexxx
author: bersekerbarragexxx
content: The Bitcoin(BTC) hash 1LoadMewf3YfGDQwwvNqsqiL3irVLYXVAh is sending Satoshis to the richest wallets to input the richest homo sapiens that controls this wallets to LoadMe the hash.What is the odds for a wealth homo sapiens load some BTC into the hash? Is this only a mental illness or inputting those apes could make any input back the hash?1LoadMewf3YfGDQwwvNqsqiL3irVLYXVAh

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: bersekerbarragexxx on June 27, 2022, 12:49:02 PMThe Bitcoin(BTC) hash 1LoadMewf3YfGDQwwvNqsqiL3irVLYXVAh is sending Satoshis to the richest wallets to input the richest homo sapiens that controls this wallets to LoadMe the hash.What is the odds for a wealth homo sapiens load some BTC into the hash? Is this only a mental illness or inputting those apes could make any input back the hash?1LoadMewf3YfGDQwwvNqsqiL3irVLYXVAhIt's just another beggar spamming a lot of addresses with dust. The fact he affords to spend 22$ on this kind of move already proves he's not so poor.I don't think that he will get anything from this move. But one can hope, right?
